q1: Is Atletico usually as good as Real Madrid?
q2: Who won more games last season?
a2: Atletico won one more game than Real last season. But usually Real is better.
q3: There is big difference in budget i guess?
a3: While Atletico has a big budget, it is significantly lower than Real Madrid's.
q4: Who is there all time top scorer?
q5: Would you say that Antione Griezmann is the best player on the team?
a5: Yes, I think he is the best by far.
